title: WOW. I had 1 beer and 2 pieces of pizza and I feel like one of those 40 year old neck-beards
body:
You know, the ones with the beer belly and naked at their computer desk. I feel like a fat slob. I'v really let myself go GD. Maybe I should up-vote any posts by a grill to fulfill the white knight persona :^) 

On a side note now I feel sick....mainly from the pizza...only from the pizza..
